book_info.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
book_info.author: J.K. Rowling
book_info.summary: The story follows Harry Potter, an orphan boy who discovers he is a wizard, as he attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry makes friends with Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger and together they become entangled in a mystery surrounding the powerful Sorcerer's Stone.

characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: Harry is an orphan boy who discovers he is a wizard. He is brave, loyal, and determined.
characters.motivations: To uncover the truth about his parents and the Sorcerer's Stone
characters.arc: Harry's journey from an unknown orphan to a celebrated wizard

relationships.label: Friend
relationships.details: Ron and Harry become fast friends on the Hogwarts Express. They share a deep bond and support each other throughout their adventures.
relationships.quotes: Ron: 'You're a lot braver than I am, Harry.'

relationships.label: Friend
relationships.details: Hermione is a brilliant student who helps Harry and Ron in their quest. She is resourceful and quick-witted.
relationships.quotes: Hermione: 'We've got to be careful, we've got to think this through.'

characters.quotes: Harry: 'I'm not going to let you get away with it, Malfoy.'

characters.name: Ron Weasley
characters.description: Ron is Harry's best friend and a loyal companion. He is brave and willing to risk himself to help others.
characters.motivations: To support Harry and be a good friend
characters.arc: Ron's journey from a uncertain young wizard to a confident and brave individual

relationships.label: Friend

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.description: Hermione is a brilliant and resourceful young witch. She is a valuable friend to Harry and Ron.
characters.motivations: To help Harry and Ron and uncover the truth
characters.arc: Hermione's journey from a know-it-all student to a confident and brave individual

relationships.label: Friend

characters.quotes: Hermione: 'It's not just a matter of waving a wand and saying some magic words, you know.'

main_events.event: The trio uncovers the mystery of the Sorcerer's Stone
main_events.quotes: Hermione: 'We've got to be careful, we've got to think this through.'
main_events.details: Harry, Ron, and Hermione work together to uncover the truth about the Sorcerer's Stone and prevent it from falling into the wrong hands.
